;SAM " 1 " Parking Lots
;Added December 24, 2007
;Originally By JPlumbley and Tarkus
;Orthogonal adjacency code rewritten by Jondor 08/15/2011
;
;SAM RUL Template
;Starter Piece
0x5e54b100,1,0,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5e54b100,1,0,0x5e54b100,1,0
0x5e54b100,1,0,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5e54b100,1,0,0x5e54b100,3,0
0x5e54b100,3,0,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5e54b100,3,0,0x5e54b100,1,0
0x5e54b100,3,0,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5e54b100,3,0,0x5e54b100,3,0
;
;----------------------------------------------------------
;
0x05004b00,1,0,0x5e54b100,1,0=0x5e54b100,1,0,0x5e54b100,1,0
0x05004b00,1,0,0x5e54b100,3,0=0x5e54b100,1,0,0x5e54b100,3,0
0x05004b00,3,0,0x5e54b100,1,0=0x5e54b100,3,0,0x5e54b100,1,0
0x05004b00,3,0,0x5e54b100,3,0=0x5e54b100,3,0,0x5e54b100,3,0
;Ortho Stub
0x5e54b100,1,0,0x05000300,1,0=0x5e54b100,1,0,0x5e500100,1,0
0x5e54b100,3,0,0x05000300,1,0=0x5e54b100,3,0,0x5e500100,1,0
;
;----------------------------------------------------------
;
;90-degree curve
0x5e54b100,1,0,0x05000f00,1,0=0x5e54b100,1,0,0x5e590100,1,0
0x5e54b100,1,0,0x05000f00,2,0=0x5e54b100,1,0,0x5e590100,2,0
0x5e54b100,3,0,0x05000f00,1,0=0x5e54b100,3,0,0x5e590100,1,0
0x5e54b100,3,0,0x05000f00,2,0=0x5e54b100,3,0,0x5e590100,2,0
;Adjacency
;Ortho Straight
0x5e590100,0,0,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5e590100,0,0,0x5e54b100,1,0
0x5e590100,0,0,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5e590100,0,0,0x5e54b100,3,0
0x5e590100,3,0,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5e590100,3,0,0x5e54b100,1,0
0x5e590100,3,0,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5e590100,3,0,0x5e54b100,3,0
;Ortho Stub
;90-degree curve
;+-intersection
;T-intersection
;
;----------------------------------------------------------
;
;+-intersection
0x5e54b100,1,0,0x05020700,0,0=0x5e54b100,1,0,0x5e527100,0,0
0x5e54b100,1,0,0x05020700,1,0=0x5e54b100,1,0,0x5e527100,1,0
0x5e54b100,1,0,0x05020700,2,0=0x5e54b100,1,0,0x5e527100,2,0
0x5e54b100,1,0,0x05020700,3,0=0x5e54b100,1,0,0x5e527100,3,0
0x5e54b100,3,0,0x05020700,0,0=0x5e54b100,3,0,0x5e527100,0,0
0x5e54b100,3,0,0x05020700,1,0=0x5e54b100,3,0,0x5e527100,1,0
0x5e54b100,3,0,0x05020700,2,0=0x5e54b100,3,0,0x5e527100,2,0
0x5e54b100,3,0,0x05020700,3,0=0x5e54b100,3,0,0x5e527100,3,0
;Adjacency
;Ortho Straight
0x5e527100,0,0,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5e527100,0,0,0x5e54b100,1,0
0x5e527100,0,0,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5e527100,0,0,0x5e54b100,3,0
0x5e527100,1,0,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5e527100,1,0,0x5e54b100,1,0
0x5e527100,1,0,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5e527100,1,0,0x5e54b100,3,0

;90-degree curve
;+-intersection

;----------------------------------------------------------

;T-intersection
0x5e54b100,1,0,0x05005700,1,0=0x5e54b100,1,0,0x5e557100,1,0
0x5e54b100,1,0,0x05005700,2,0=0x5e54b100,1,0,0x5e557100,2,0

0x5e54b100,3,0,0x05005700,3,0=0x5e54b100,3,0,0x5e557100,3,0
;Adjacency
;Ortho Straight
0x5e557100,0,0,0x05004b00,1,0=0x5e557100,0,0,0x5e54b100,1,0

0x5e557100,3,0,0x05004b00,3,0=0x5e557100,3,0,0x5e54b100,3,0
;Ortho Stub
;90-degree curve
;+-intersection
;T-intersection
;
;---SAM 1 to Street/SAM Transitions---
;revised by Tarkus 15 April 2021

;to/from Street
0x5E54B100,1,0,0x5E5C0080,0,0=0x5E54B100,1,0,0x5E5C1100,2,0
0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C0080,0,0=0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C1100,2,0
0x5E54B100,1,0,0x5E5C0080,2,0=0x5E54B100,1,0,0x5E5C1100,2,0
0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C0080,2,0=0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C1100,2,0

;rot 2 point (SAM Set number less than current)-

;to/from SAM 0
0x5E54B100,1,0,0x5E5C0000,0,0=0x5E54B100,1,0,0x5E5C0100,2,0
0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C0000,0,0=0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C0100,2,0

;-rot 0 point (SAM Set number greater than current)-
;to/from SAM 2
0x5E54B100,1,0,0x5E5C2200,0,0=0x5E54B100,1,0,0x5E5C1200,0,0
0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C2200,0,0=0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C1200,0,0

;to/from SAM 3
0x5E54B100,1,0,0x5E5C3300,0,0=0x5E54B100,1,0,0x5E5C1300,0,0
0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C3300,0,0=0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C1300,0,0

;to/from SAM 4
0x5E54B100,1,0,0x5E5C4400,0,0=0x5E54B100,1,0,0x5E5C1400,0,0
0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C4400,0,0=0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C1400,0,0

0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C5500,0,0=0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C1500,0,0

0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C6600,0,0=0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C1600,0,0

0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C7700,0,0=0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C1700,0,0

0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5CAA00,0,0=0x5E54B100,3,0,0x5E5C1A00,0,0
